fields_of_interest: Trade, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
eu_initiatives:
EU-Japan FTA negotiations 
Trasnport (mainly rail) regulations 
The fourth rail package, liberalization of rail market
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: East Japan Railway Company has been a partner member of CER (Community of European Railway and Infrastructure Companies) since May 2008.
goals__remit:
East Japan Railway Company operates passenger railways in the eastern part of Japan including Tokyo Metropolitan area. 
The principal activities of its Brussels Branch office are as follows: 
1)Promotion and enhancement of the railway businesses in the regions of Europe, Middle East and Africa  
2)Further promotion in making oversea procurement 
3)Consultation and negotiation with the international railway associations and organizations
